name: Hotel 115 Christchurch

reviews.title: Good Value!
reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel off the square for 2 nights whilist we were in south island of NZ, and although it was a small room and a bit qwerky, for the price we paid (£40 a night for the room) it was good value and we wouldent of expected anymore!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room looked out onto the stairs, which was a bit wierd! The staff were very nice and polite and the room and hotel was very clean. They have tried to make it a bit trendy, but i think that went wrong!
reviews.title: A GREAT little spot

likes.liked: — Warm, colorful home base for winter visit to Christchurch

reviews.text: Its a small hotel and although its next to a massage parlour, its very quiet and you dont hear any noise. Recommemded for those who dont want luxary but just a clean and quiet place to stay. we would stay again, but not for longer than 2 nights!
reviews.title: Great hotel, god staff

description: Hotel 115 is a locally owned contemporary boutique hotel located in the heart of the city. The chic hotel design brings a feeling of luxury and elegance but with a modern, eclectic style. Behind bespoke yellow doors, the hotel’s thirty rooms boast a mix of classic as well as modern features. A relaxing place full of modern charm.
